# rscale

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of rscale is to make it easier to work with consistently structured
survey data, with scales composed of individual items. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of rscale from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("amacfarland/rscale")
```
